Posted By: True_Mumin (8/6/2009 3:45:21 AM)

posts.post_content: What makes this card so amazing is that everyone always overlooks the obvious lack of a keyword in the ability.. its not -combat- damage. This means anything that makes the creature do damage, electropotence, soul's fire, etc, will destroy a land every turn. If you mana ramp this guy out on turn 3 or 4 and start destroying lands your opponent is never going to recover. Later in the game he's still a 6/6 with trample for only 5 mana in red and green, both colors that have great mana acceleration.
posts.html:
